content:
changes:

  • added Title for day/night logo
  • positioned day and night logo alongside
  • Repace delete button with "X" icon
  • removed upload button and realm logo upload triggered by clicking on realm logo element itself

redesign.gif
logo_section_redesign.png
It looks like the night logo lost its default-dark background on the box?
Or maybe your example image just has a white rather than transparent background; I can't tell.

Tim Abbott said:

It looks like the night logo lost its default-dark background on the box?

yeah, that's what I'm thinking about also. can we have night theme color as a background color for night logo and white background for a day logo regardless of the theme in use?
That's what we have right now in master.

yeah, I'm talking about the new container background color. as you suggested new container size(full width) will remain the same regardless of the size of the logo image. I got your point, Tim, I'll make changes
